Text:
Thank you Bicycle Repair Man!!

Sry, couldn't help myself :p
Thank you, a very comprehensive book.
Thanks! The download is slow, but I'm looking forward to get the book!
Thank you very much! :) :) :) I've been searching for this kind of book for a very long time. I want to learn how to repair my bicycle on my own.
what a great find! thanks so much

This is an awesome guide, but VERY advanced, and more than a little intimidating.  Download it, and seed it sure, but check out www.sheldonbrown.com and www.parktool.com/repair/ for more user friendly info.
